  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BoardView
    The BoardView class represents the graphical user interface for the Arimaa game board.
    FinishArrangement
    The FinishArrangement class represents a dialog window to finish the initial arrangement phase of the game.
    MenuView
    The MenuView class represents the main menu of the game.
    MyTimer
    The MyTimer class represents the game timer window.
    NewGameView
    The NewGameView class represents the window for starting a new game.
    ShowTurns
    The ShowTurns class represents the window for displaying game turn options and history.
